name: Drillkanoid
description:
A small arkanoid clone I did awhile ago, mostly functioning, but never brought to a finished state. Full game sources are on patreon. https://www.patreon.com/posts/19623712

Controls are

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z to initiate game
  • Hold z and left/right to tilt paddle

Collect 5 of the same gem (only yellow and blue work in the demo) which results in a powerup.
